coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.dao

Interface Dao


  • public interface Dao
    This dao manages the registration process.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

      • getContentVersion

        ContentVersion getContentVersion(ManagedModule managedModule,
                               String toolName,
                               String contentVersion)

        Parameters:

        toolName - The tool name.
        contentVersion - The content version.
        Returns:
        The content version or null if it does not exist.

      • getContentVersionCloseTo

        ContentVersion getContentVersionCloseTo(ManagedModule managedModule,
                                      String toolName,
                                      String contentVersion)
        Retrieve a content version that is either the specified version or the closest one before this, if it exist. Note this may be active or inactive.
        Parameters:
        managedModule - a ManagedModule object.
        toolName - The tool name.
        contentVersion - The content version.
        Returns:
        The content version or null if it does not exist.

      • getContentVersionWithNullCheck

        ContentVersion getContentVersionWithNullCheck(String username,
                                            String moduleId,
                                            String toolName)
                                              throws SynthesisException
        Retrieve the content version for the user's device.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        Returns:
        The content version.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if the device registration, module registration or content version cannot be found.

      • getMasterContentVersion

                                     String toolName)
                                       throws SynthesisException

        Parameters:
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        Returns:
        the content version.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if the device registration, module registration or content version cannot be found.

      • getContentVersionsWithNullCheck

                                                   String moduleId)
                                                     throws SynthesisException
        Retrieve all the user's device content versions.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        Returns:
        A list of content versions.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if the device registration or module registration cannot be found.

      • getMasterContentVersions

                                              throws SynthesisException
        Retrieve all the master content versions.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - The module id.
        Returns:
        A list of content versions.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if the device registration or module registration cannot be found.

      • getContentVersions

        List<ContentVersion> getContentVersions(ManagedModule managedModule,
                                      String toolName)
        Retrieve all the content versions for the tool and module.
        Parameters:
        managedModule - a ManagedModule object.
        toolName - The tool name.
        Returns:
        The list of content versions in order from oldest to newest.

      • getContentVersions

        List<ContentVersion> getContentVersions(ManagedModule managedModule,
                                      String toolName,
                                      String fromContentVersion,
                                      String toContentVersion)
        Retrieve all the content versions for the tool and module from the fromContentVersion exclusive to the toContentVersion inclusive.
        Parameters:
        managedModule - a ManagedModule object.
        toolName - The tool name.
        fromContentVersion - The from content version, exclusive.
        toContentVersion - The content version, inclusive.
        Returns:
        The list of content versions in order from oldest to newest.

      • deactivateAllContentVersions

        int deactivateAllContentVersions(Long moduleRegistrationId,
                               String toolName)
        Deactivate all content versions for the device, module and tool name.
        Parameters:
        moduleRegistrationId - The module registration id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        Returns:
        The number of content versions updated.

      • deactivateAllOther

        int deactivateAllOther(ContentVersion contentVersion)
        Deactivate all content versions for the device, module and tool name other then this content version.
        Parameters:
        contentVersion - The content version not to deactivate.
        Returns:
        The number of content versions updated.
